verses.verse: That which <WG3739> was <WG2258> <WG5713> from <WG575> the beginning <WG746>, which <WG3739> we have heard <WG191> <WG5754>, which <WG3739> we have seen <WG3708> <WG5758> with our <WG2257> eyes <WG3788>, which <WG3739> we have looked upon <WG2300> <WG5662>, and <WG2532> our <WG2257> hands <WG5495> have handled <WG5584> <WG5656>, of <WG4012> the Word <WG3056> of life <WG2222>;

(For <WG2532> the life <WG2222> was manifested <WG5319> <WG5681>, and <WG2532> we have seen <WG3708> <WG5758> it, and <WG2532> bear witness <WG3140> <WG5719>, and <WG2532> shew <WG518> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213> that eternal <WG166> life <WG2222>, which <WG3748> was <WG2258> <WG5713> with <WG4314> the Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> was manifested <WG5319> <WG5681> unto us <WG2254>;)

That which <WG3739> we have seen <WG3708> <WG5758> and <WG2532> heard <WG191> <WG5754> declare we <WG518> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG2443> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> may have <WG2192> <WG5725> fellowship <WG2842> with <WG3326> us <WG2257>: and <WG2532> truly our <WG2251> fellowship <WG2842> <WG1161> is with <WG3326> the Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> with <WG3326> his <WG846> Son <WG5207> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.
And <WG2532> these things <WG5023> write we <WG1125> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG2443> your <WG5216> joy <WG5479> may be <WG5600> <WG5753> full <WG4137> <WG5772>.

This <WG3778> then <WG2532> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the message <WG1860> which <WG3739> we have heard <WG191> <WG5754> of <WG575> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> declare <WG312> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, that <WG3754> 'Elohim <WG2316> is <WG2076> <WG5748> light <WG5457>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> him <WG846> is <WG2076> <WG5748> no <WG3756> darkness <WG4653> at all <WG3762>.

If <WG1437> we say <WG2036> <WG5632> that <WG3754> we have <WG2192> <WG5719> fellowship <WG2842> with <WG3326> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> walk <WG4043> <WG5725> in <WG1722> darkness <WG4655>, we lie <WG5574> <WG5727>, and <WG2532> do <WG4160> <WG5719> not <WG3756> the truth <WG225>:

But <WG1161> if <WG1437> we walk <WG4043> <WG5725> in <WG1722> the light <WG5457>, as <WG5613> he <WG846> is <WG2076> <WG5748> in <WG1722> the light <WG5457>, we have <WG2192> <WG5719> fellowship <WG2842> one with another <WG3326> <WG240>, and <WG2532> the blood <WG129> of Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> his <WG846> Son <WG5207> cleanseht <WG2511> <WG5719> us <WG2248> from <WG575> all <WG3956> sin <WG266>.

If <WG1437> we say <WG2036> <WG5632> that <WG3754> we have <WG2192> <WG5719> no <WG3756> sin <WG266>, we deceive <WG4105> <WG5719> ourselves <WG1438>, and <WG2532> the truth <WG225> is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> us <WG2254>.

If <WG1437> we confess <WG3670> <WG5725> our <WG2257> sins <WG266>, he is <WG2076> <WG5748> faithful <WG4103> and <WG2532> just <WG1342> to <WG2443> forgive <WG863> <WG5632> us <WG2254> our sins <WG266>, and <WG2532> to cleanse <WG2511> <WG5661> us <WG2248> from <WG575> all <WG3956> unrighteousness <WG93>.

If <WG1437> we say <WG2036> <WG5632> that <WG3754> we have <WG264> not <WG3756> sinned <WG264> <WG5758>, we make <WG4160> <WG5719> him <WG846> a liar <WG5583>, and <WG2532> his <WG846> word <WG3056> is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> us <WG2254>.
